Filename: Interdisciplinary Design Strategy Program Postgraduate at the Brookfield Sustainability Institute G414  George Brown College2024.json
Program Information_Experiential Learnin: Students have ten (10) hours (Semester 1) and fifteen (15) hours (Semester 2) per week of paid consulting work, within the BSI's Global Solutions Studio (GSS), mentored by the GSS's Director/Senior Staff.
